requirements.title: Calculate completeness scores with 4 dimensions
requirements.description: Calculate scores across Quality (50%), Coverage (15%), Quantity (10%), UI (25%)

children.title: Quality dimension scoring
children.description: Calculate requirement pass rate (20pts), target pass rate (15pts), test pass rate (15pts)

children.title: Coverage dimension scoring
children.description: Calculate test coverage ratio (8pts), requirement depth (7pts)

children.title: Quantity dimension scoring
children.description: Calculate requirements count (4pts), targets count (3pts), tests count (3pts)

children.title: UI dimension scoring
children.description: Calculate template detection (10pts), component complexity (5pts), API integration (6pts), routing (1.5pts), code volume (2.5pts)

requirements.title: Score retrieval API endpoint
requirements.description: GET endpoint to retrieve current score and breakdown for any scenario

requirements.title: Weight redistribution
requirements.description: When components are disabled, redistribute weights proportionally to remaining components

requirements.title: Graceful degradation
requirements.description: Return partial scores when some collectors fail rather than failing entirely
